summary: August 30 is the 242nd day of the year  in the Gregorian calendar.
full_text:
Aldo Junior Simoncini  is a Sammarinese footballer who plays as a goalkeeper for San Marino club A.C. Libertas and San Marino national team.
He won the 2012/13 San Marino International player of the year, and the same title in domestic football in the same season.
title: Aldo Simoncini
